page.title: 10W.I. Adbaston & Offley Hay
page.content: Adbaston's 41 members meet monthly, to discuss County Business, hear a guest speaker (usually informative), talk - over refreshments, hold bring and buy sales, or display information leaflets on W.I. and local matters. Members are encouraged to join in County activities- computer courses, Craft, tree-planting. The group is involved with the local community and other W.I.s. Adbaston and neighbouring Broughton meet annually to brief the joint representative before the National A.G.M. Offley Hey W.I. has 25 members and its activities are similar to those of the Adbaston group. Meetings of both W.I.s are well attended.
